objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#2E5D1A'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#3E6D2A'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F5F5F5'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E0E0E0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L450 0 L1080 630 Z' fill='#FF6F61' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#bg2)'/><g transform='rotate(-45, 540, 540)'><line x1='0' y1='540' x2='1080' y2='540' stroke='#FF6F61' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='580' x2='1080' y2='580' stroke='#FF6F61' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><line x1='0' y1='620' x2='1080' y2='620' stroke='#FF6F61' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='20' fill='#FF6F61' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FF6F61' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='20' fill='#2E5D1A' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='10' fill='#2E5D1A' opacity='0.1'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Water resistant design
• 14 pockets, 3 compartments
• Fits 16" laptop & 11" iPad Pro
• Expandable for extra 8L space

product_details.description:
• Crafted with reverse coated polyester and microfibre. 
  • Water resistant. 
  • 14 pockets. 3 compartments. Designed to organise your work days and staycations. 
  • Front compartment comes with a retractable key holder, large slip pockets, pen pockets and a zippered pocket. 
  • Main compartment opens flat, to give you full access to your items. 
  • Comes with a spill-proof pocket for your toiletries. 
  • Elastic slip pockets along the walls of your backpack. 
  • Zippered mesh storage compartment makes room for your weekend staycation. 
  • Comes with an expansion system, which you can unzip to get an additional 8L of packing space. 
  • Shock-proof tech compartment that opens flat and protects your tech from those accidental drops. Fits up to a 16” laptop and an 11” iPad Pro. 
  • Contoured bottle pocket on the side for your water bottle/umbrella.
  • Quick access zippered pocket at the top. 
  • Hidden passport pocket at the back. 
  • Padded shoulder straps designed for all day comfort. 
  • Luggage sleeve that secures to any Mokobara luggage. 
  • Dedicated rain cover compartment at the bottom. Use the rain cover to protect your Mokobara from the rains.
  • Size - 44 x 29 x 23 cm

banner_details:
The banner showcases a promotional layout for a backpack with a clean, modern design. The background is divided diagonally with a deep green gradient on the upper left and a soft gray gradient on the lower right, overlaid with subtle angled lines and translucent circles for added depth. The main text layer `heading` is bold and white, commanding attention at the top-left corner. Just below it, the `subheading` appears in a vibrant coral red. A smaller white `description` text block below highlights key product features. The `price` text is bold and placed at the lower left. Bottom-left sits a vivid coral rectangle `cta_button` with a center-aligned `cta` call-to-action in dark green. A scaled backpack `product_image` is prominently displayed on the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Green: #2E5D1A
- Olive Green: #3E6D2A
- Coral Red: #FF6F61
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #F5F5F5 / #E0E0E0
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish backpack with a dominant matte navy blue color (#2E3A59), which gives it a premium and understated appeal. The soft yet structured fabric elegantly blends different blue hues, with a darker bold oversized typography element (#1F2635) that adds visual depth without overwhelming the design. Accents of yellow-orange (#F4B400) on the handle and zipper lining serve as vibrant highlights, drawing attention to functional elements and adding a touch of playful contrast. Subtle black details (#000000), such as the logo patch and strap hardware, provide balance and ensure the overall visual stays cohesive and professional.
